pages.text: $(li)The Book and Quill will help you to take notes in all your journey.$(br)$(li)You can use it to craft an Atlas or Emtpy Antique Atlas in a Crafting Table.

$(li)To use the Book and Quill, first you have to right click while you are holding the item on your hand.$(br)$(li)To save changes, just click in the Done button.$(br)$(li)Finally, if you want to make your book uneditable, click the Sign button, add a title and click the Sign and Close Button to confirm it.
